name: Tsugihagi Hyoryu Sakka
nutshell: Kibino Makibi is a young Hyoryu Sakka (wandering writer) who seeks to get his Hyoryuroku (wanderer's log) published. Hyoryu Sakka are some kind of explorators going on expedition to unknown places and unknown events in the world, to fill up the black spots of the world. Armed with an umbrella he meets up with Mitsune, the "editor-in-chief" of Sogano Publications. Their journey begins…

name: Touhou - Suzunone (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Two ~50 page Touhou doujin stories by Morino Hon and N2FC.

name: Mega Man 4Koma Great Parade
nutshell: A compilation of Rockman-themed 4-koma manga originally published in Comic BomBom.

name: Sapphism no Gensou
nutshell:
A side story of the visual novel* of the same name, about students at the elite girls-only school ship H.B. Polestar.
*Sapphism no Gensou is based on the visual novel of the same name by Liar-soft.

name: Corpse Party CEMETERY0 - Kaibyaku no Ars Moriendi
nutshell: There is a website for suicides appearing on the internet only at midnight and when certain specific keywords are searched. Although it is supposed to be only a mere urban myth, girls who have performed the ritual suddenly disappeared. High school paranormalist Naho Saenoki launches an investigation to shed light on this gruesome incident while the amount of victims keeps increasing.

name: Soredemo Sekai wa Utsukushii
nutshell: Nike is the fourth princess of the Rain Dukedom and one who holds the power to call forth the rain. Despite her own reluctance, for the sake of her country she travels to the Sun Kingdom to marry Sun King Livius. She soon discovers that the King, who conquered the world within only three years of ascending to the throne, is actually… a child?! Furthermore, for trivial reasons, he demands that Nike call forth the rain…?!

name: minna no ouji de itai onna no ko to mamoritai onna no ko
Outro
nutshell: Her girlfriend, who she's been dating for seven years, is wallowing in bed with another girl, and her dream of debut has been shattered, so she doesn't have many expectations anymore. Suddenly, ray of hope appears in front of Ji-an; she receives an offer to appear in a program that highly appreciates Jian's self-composed song. Jian is excited about the opportunity to escape from her lover Yoo Won...

name: Sho Nuff I Do
nutshell: A short piece about getting a job and going out into society, old flames, and Elmore James.

name: Orichalcum Reycal
nutshell: Sakugi Mitsuaki is a poor college student who gets hooked on figure modeling. In return for helping his class he receives some special putty – but the figure he builds with it suddenly comes to life. The figure is a life force called Orichalcum ("Oriharukon") that fulfills the wish of its creator. Their strange life together begins

name: Kaze ga Gotoku
nutshell: Goemon Ishikawa, the legendary king of thieves from the feudal era, has come to know that there is an important treasure being transported from the Imperial Palace to the Kamiyama mansion; an ancient artifact called "moon's melody box" (月詠みの箱). Surprised by the extreme measures taken by the guards of this treasure, his indomitable spirit aches to steal this rare item that once a year can grant one special wish to whoever possesses the box, but it will not be so easy to steal it. Even worse, once it is opened, it will be harder to deal with the unusual contents of the box.

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha ViVid - Change! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Have you ever woken up in your bed like normal, but this time you’re in the body of a tiny, white bunny plushie? Yeah, me either. But this sure proved one crazy day for Vivio.

name: Amaku Nureru Uso - Kekkon to Iu nano Fukushuu
nutshell: Rie's boyfriend was handsome and skillful, and everyone in her office adored him! Moreover, they hid their relationship from everyone, so every day was thrilling. One day, her boyfriend told her that he had something important to discuss, and Rie thought that he was going to propose to her, but... her heart was broken instead. Her boyfriend told her that he was getting married to a woman who had conceived his child and asked her to break up with him. Then, Rie's manager brought up the idea of a blind date to Rie who had been suffering alone. The man she would meet up with was Yuichi Kuroki, Yasushi's only rival. Kuroki, who was highly regarded in the office for his appearance and skills, said to Rie, "I've decided on you." Rie, who was not able to read Kuroki's feelings, thought that the whole blind date had been arranged beforehand, but...?

name: OPM x MP100 x Arakawa Under the Bridge x Saint☆Oniisan x Black Knight Parade
nutshell: Christmas Collaboration

name: Yuuryou Bukken Mou Dame Sou - Furo, Toilet to Tenshi wa Kyoudou desu
nutshell: A story about a 70-year-old super cheap apartment named "Damesou" near the coast of a rural village with a communal bathroom, washstand, kitchen, and toilets, and the losers taking residence here!

name: Yakuza-sama no Omocha
nutshell:
1-4. Yakuza-sama no Omocha
5. Hana no Akuta
5.5 Yakuza-sama no Omocha Extra

name: Malignant and Straight-forward
nutshell: O Mundo está louco, não?

name: Gambler Jikochuushin-ha
nutshell: With a pleasant soundtrack, here comes Mochisugi Dorao! With the way he draws his tiles brilliantly to the samba rhythm without regard to the stray mahjong players who appear one after another, you may even think that mahjong has reached the level of an art form (?!). A storm of gags is about to leave you breathless! Let the battle royal of the century begin! This is the quintessence of mahjong manga!

name: A One on One, Your Highness
nutshell: When a modern girl time-travels to the ancient times and finds herself trapped in the body of a deserted concubine, Shane Yun, and bullied by other concubines in the Prince Qin's Residence, her strong modern personality burst out, and overturns the entire harem…

name: Carrier Falcon Princess
nutshell:
Zelle, the eighth royal princess of Roymonde, who was driven to the brink of defeat in the war. She was kidnapped by the enemy, and when she woke up... She became a bird?!
Fortunately or unfortunately, as the messenger bird of Commander-in-Chief, Valhayle! She struggles for her country even though she is in a bird’s body.
But you can't even do as much as treat me like a bird!!

After losing consciousness while fleeing the war raging in Roymund Kingdom, Princess Zeline wakes up in the body of a messenger falcon! She’s now the bird in charge of delivering information for Commander Valhyle and his army, who are searching for the remaining royal descendants. She may be tiny and feathered, but Zeline is determined to use her missions to find out what happened to her family. Can this little birdie gain the skeptical commander’s trust and give her kingdom new wings?

Original Webtoon: Daum, KakaoPage
Official Translations:

English: Radish, Tapas
Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语
Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語
French / Français
Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia
Japanese / 日本語
Thai / ภาษาไทย

name: Have You Seen My Brother?
nutshell: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

name: Occult Maiden - Hishou - Oni o Tsugu Shounen
nutshell: A boy loses his parents in a supernatural disaster known as a "Curse" and is then adopted by the Tsuchimikado family; a family that exorcises curses. Ten years later and the boy has become the head of the family and now goes about exorcising curses all the while trying to balance his job as an exorcist and his life as a student in high school.

name: The King's Choice
nutshell:
A oneshot:
In a peaceful kingdom with a much loved King. There is only one problem. Hopefully the King will make the right choice.

name: Stitch by Stitch
nutshell: Joo-won comes from a high-class background but spends his time in an old embroidery room. In embroidering, he hopes to finally find Gwangmyeong, as was told to him by a famous fortune teller. The man works stitch by stitch in a shabby neighborhood as he tries to find the light to his life

name: Skill Ga Nakereba Level wo Ageru ~ 99 Ga Kansuto No Sekai De Level 800 Man Kara Sutato ~
nutshell: The main character "Ryuya"  is told that he has no skills and is abandoned by his friends. The only way for him to compete with those possessing skills is to raise his level. After five years of training in the forest, he has raised his level to 8 million. Due to his excessively high level, he is beyond the reach of skilled humans, demons, or even gods. This is a story of a simple hero who feels guilty for not having skills, and how he helps others.

name: Short/Strip
nutshell:
Read from left –> right
Collection of unrelated short comics/ strips author came up with at the moment, posted between other releases.

name: Junjou Haraguro Kareshi
nutshell: Yuuki is a cute boy, who is Akane's childhood friend. Akane starts to fall in love with a guy and she confides in Yuuki. But Yuuki would not have it, as he kisses Akane. For the first time, Akane gets to see the real Yuuki?!

name: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch
nutshell: Lucia is the new girl at school. She and her sister run a public bath that's all the rage. When Lucia meets a terrific-looking surfer boy, there's just one little problem: Lucia is a mermaid – not just any mermaid, but a princess on an important mission to save the seven seas from an evil force bent on taking control of the marine world. Such a responsibility doesn't leave much time for romance. But Lucia vows to protect her world and win the heart of handsome Kaito.
